name: Show More Client Versions
description: Display detailed game, system, and mod information on the main menu with extensive customization options

conf-showOSVersion.name: Show Operating System
conf-showOSVersion.description: Display the operating system (Windows, macOS, Android, iOS, Linux)

conf-showArchitecture.name: Show CPU Architecture
conf-showArchitecture.description: Display the CPU architecture (x64, x86, ARM64, ARM32)

conf-showModCount.name: Show Mod Statistics
conf-showModCount.description: Display detailed mod statistics (enabled, disabled, total)

conf-versionsOnNewLines.name: One Line Per Version
conf-versionsOnNewLines.description: Show each version on its own line rather than on one single line

conf-versionsPosition.name: Versions Position
conf-versionsPosition.description: Set the position of the versions on the main menu

conf-customPosX.name: Custom Position X
conf-customPosX.description: X coordinate for custom position (only used when 'Custom' is selected)

conf-customPosY.name: Custom Position Y
conf-customPosY.description: Y coordinate for custom position (only used when 'Custom' is selected)

conf-versionsScale.name: Versions Scale
conf-versionsScale.description: Set the size/scale of the version text

conf-versionsOpacity.name: Versions Opacity
conf-versionsOpacity.description: Set the opacity of the versions on the main menu

conf-debugLoggingEnabled.name: Debug Logging
conf-debugLoggingEnabled.description: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Logging must be set to info in Geode settings.
